fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.tests

Class TestApplicationVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.tests.TestApplicationVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class TestApplicationVM
extends fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
    The class TestApplicationVM deploys an ApplicationVM running on a Computer component connected to a ComputerMonitor component and then execute a test scenario.

    Description

    The test scenario submits ten requests to the application virtual machine and the waits for the completion of these requests. In parallel, the computer monitor starts the notification of the dynamic state of the computer by requesting 25 pushes at the rate of one each second.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : May 4, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
